posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking to trade this Red Cross tobacco pouch (seal is broken, but the tobacco is still inside).  Would be interested in T215 cards (low grade), among others (I collect a lot of random stuff).  Or for sale, $575.

While I've chewed 30 year-old Topps bubble gum, I haven't tried chewing or smoking this tobacco, so I can't confirm whether or not it's sweet (as advertised).  :D

I can provide the full-size photos via email.

Email only, no PMs.

Cheers,
Steve
Forgot about this one...bump and added a price in case nobody wants to trade.
